name: Dinari CCL
description: The Dinari CCL dShares token (CCL.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Carnival Corporation & plc (NYSE: CCL), the world's largest cruise company. Carnival operates a fleet of over 100 ships across multiple brands, offering cruise vacations to various destinations worldwide. Each CCL.d token is fully backed by a corresponding CCL stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, CCL.d provides investors with exposure to the cruise industry through a regulated financial product, offering benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
